G

GameEngine - Class in adventure
The game engine is the main controller class for the adventure system.
GameEngine(GameWorld, ResponseManager) - Constructor for class adventure.GameEngine
Constructs a game engine form an existing game world and a default responder.
GameWorld - Class in adventure
Holds information about the game world.
GameWorld(String, List<String>, Map<String, Room>, Map<String, Thing>, Map<String, CustomResponder>) - Constructor for class adventure.GameWorld
Constructs a game world using a default location, a list of inventory items, a mapping of room names to room objects, a mapping of thing names to thing objects, and a mapping of room or thing names to custom responders.
GameWorldBuilder - Class in adventure
A builder class for game world objects.
GameWorldBuilder() - Constructor for class adventure.GameWorldBuilder
Constructs a game world builder.
generateResponse(String) - Method in interface adventure.ResponseManager
Parses the specified command, generates a response, and potentially updates the game world.
getAllRoomObjects(String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Returns a flat list of all objects in the specified room.
getChildren(String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Returns a list of all direct children of the specified thing.
getDescendents(String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Returns a list of all descendents of the specified game object.
getInventory() - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Returns a list of all objects in the player's inventory.
getLocation() - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Returns the current location (room) of the player.
getOutputText(String) - Method in class adventure.GameEngine
Takes player input and returns a description of the world from the player's point of view.
getResponder(String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Returns the custom responder for the specified room or thing.
getResponse(String, String, GameWorld) - Method in interface adventure.CustomResponder
Takes the specified verb and noun, potentially updates the specified game world based on that command, and returns a message.
getRoom(String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Given the specified room name, returns the room object.
getThing(String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Given the specified thing name, returns the thing object.
giveObjectProperty(String, String) - Method in class adventure.GameWorld
Give the specified game object the specified property.
